titleStmt.title: A preamble vnto an incounter with P.R. the author of the deceitfull treatise of mitigation concerning the Romish doctrine both in question of rebellion and aequiuocation: by Thomas Morton. Published by authoritie.
Preamble unto an incounter with P.R. the author of the deceitfull treatise of mitigation.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.
Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melch. Bradwood for Iohn Bill and Edmond Weauer,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A preamble vnto the incounter against the mitigation of P.R.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
